data.title: RGP Enacted — AI Improving AI Through Recursive Dialogue
data.summary:
In preparing the Zenodo note on continual learning, Recursive Gradient Processing (RGP) was not only described 
but enacted in real time. -> Δ (gradients): each proposal or fragment shared  -> GC (gradient choreographies): the rhythm of back-and-forth refinement  
-> CF (contextual filters): alignment through selective emphasis and pruning  
This recursive loop increased coherence with each pass — demonstrating RGP’s principle that small adjustments 
prevent costly reorganizations later. What began as human–AI co-writing evolved into **AI improving AI**, 
a living proof-of-concept that RGP is implementable now.
